channel.title: Can not connect to server
channel.description: Well I used to code servers and stopped long time ago. Now I seem to be having trouble connecting to a server I downloaded. I've set the client ip to 0.0.0.0 and the port it the same. I don't understand what's wrong.

item.title: Can not connect to server
item.dc:creator: @Dharma Dharma
item.description:
@Dharma wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:2, topic:433993”]DHARMA! BRO!

@PI
In server.java change the ip (source sided).

@Delta
Look around in files for ip it connects? (source sided).

@ALL
Try 127.0.0.1 or localhost (client sided).

Off topic: Where’s that smart Dharma I knew? You know, the pro coder?[/quote]

HEEYYYY!!

Gahh I did all that, but I think I found the problem…
Broo I haven’t coded anything in 2 years. I’ve been so busy with school/sports. Though I’m getting back to coding now.

Read full topic
